title: Deputy Head of Department, Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)
institution: Vidyavardhini's College of Engineering and Technology, Vasai
responsibilities: Assisted in departmental administration and strategic planning.
Member of the syllabus setting committee for the Data Science curriculum.
Coordinated faculty development programs and workshops.
Mentored junior faculty and academic staff.

title: Assistant Professor, Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)
institution: Vidyavardhini's College of Engineering and Technology, Vasai
responsibilities: Taught undergraduate courses in Java, Data Structures, and Database Systems.
Guided final year students on academic and research projects.
Published research papers in peer-reviewed journals.
Organized national-level technical symposiums.
